comment: In the Past, it was Rajini, Kamal. Now it's them. In future somebody
amr:
# ::snt In the Past, it was Rajini, Kamal. Now it's them. In future somebody
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / person
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Rajini")
            :domain (p2 / person
                  :name (n2 / name
                        :op1 "Kamal"))
            :time (p3 / past))
      :snt2 (t / they
            :time (n3 / now))
      :snt3 (s / somebody
            :time (f / future)))
